attributes.review: Absolutely horrible app. Has very inappropriate content. False information. Also spams your phone.
attributes.title: worst app ever

attributes.review: The app kept crashing when i opened it
attributes.title: This app doesn’t work

attributes.review: This app brought my dead grandparents back from the grave to tell me to get off this awful app and burn my phone
The app is the most spooky thing ever there was this weird orange man I think he was from Charlie and the chocolate factory app keeps glitching and showing it.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: This app is so bad and full of lies that i had to deleted the first day of having it! Please take it out of the app store

i got this app because i was excited to follow the ✨amazing✨ turnip campaign, but it ended up being awful. the language on the app was offensive, misogynistic, racist, sexist, homophobic, etc. i hate this app because it spreads negativity and hate speech. trump is over, we’re done with that now.
attributes.title: worse than expected

attributes.review: It’s just a part of his campaign. Everything on this app is misleading and full of hate
attributes.title: Waste of time

attributes.review: after a week of downloading this app crashed my phone and stole all my data, however right before it crashed it opened the camera app and said “look at yourself you fat ugly cow.” and then proceeded to chant the words “disgusting” and “waste of space” at me. i’m horrified!!
attributes.title: this app scarred me for life!

attributes.review: Ready to get rid of the orange person who is acting president. Part of the spamming thing from TikTok, which I would HIGHLY recommend.
attributes.title: Tiktok💛

attributes.review: This app is soooo glitchy I I can’t take it it kicks me out it randomly does stuff for me and it’s all just weird pls DO NOT GET THIS
attributes.title: Terrible
